duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Windows 10 (Windows 11 is a plus) support in a large corporate environment.
Handle Auto Pilot, Intune, Service Now, Dell Laptop support, HP laptop support, HP printer support, Microsoft Office 365 support, Microsoft Teams support, and Microsoft Outlook support.
Understand digital video standards (HDMI, DVI, DisplayPort) as they apply to PCs/Laptops/Monitors in the Microsoft Windows environment.
Experience with shipping logistics - boxing up equipment, creating UPS shipping labels, and tracking UPS shipments.

Demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication skills, proven teamwork skills, ability to work both independently and with a team, ability to multitask, and understand basic IT standards such as SOPs.
Provide deskside/Mac support as part of the support team.
